E-value based confidence sequences

evalue_confidence_sequence.Rd

E-value based confidence sequences

Usage

evalue_confidence_sequence(e_values, alpha = 0.05)

Arguments

e_values

Vector of e-values from sequential testing

alpha

Type I error rate

Value

Confidence sequence boundaries
